moves.name: Spike Commit
moves.card_text: A heavy commitment for spike damage.

windows.notes: Skitter is extra mean about misses.

reward_perfect_defense.notes: If players perfect-defend a lot, Aggressor starts feinting / swapping targets.

bait_heat.notes: Encourages players to spike Heat for risky damage.

feeds.notes: Aggressor gains advantage positioning when you whiff.

moves.name: Spike Commit
moves.card_text: A heavy commitment for spike damage.

windows.notes: At higher Blood Marks, the creature becomes more reactive.

reward_perfect_defense.notes: If players get too clean, mutate into anti-defense tech.

triggers.notes: Every Blood Mark gained during/after encounters can add a new tool.
